description: Summarizes technical text for non-technical people

input_variables.name: input
input_variables.description: The input text to be summarized.

input_variables.name: endpoint
input_variables.description: The HTTP endpoint that was executed.

input_variables.name: response
input_variables.description: The response from the HTTP request.

input_variables.name: swaggerFileName
input_variables.description: The Swagger file name used to build the HTTP request.
